website_summaries.verdict: A shockproof DSLR camera case that offers a terrific blend of style and function.
pros: Intended for use with DSLR cameras from Canon, Olympus, Sony, and other globally recognized brands
Comes with an extra front pocket for business cards, your cell phone or other personal items and camera accessories
Equipped with a handy quick-strap buckle
Sold in a variety of eye-catching colors to match your personal style
cons: Case's stitches tend to come loose over time
Magnetic buttons sometimes come off the case

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag to take your DSLR on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I really could not be more pleased with this bag. It is well made, cute, sturdy, and has plenty of room for my Canon 70d with a 17-50mm lens attached. I purchased it for a vacation abroad and it will be perfect to hold my camera, and everything else I will need during long days of walking around. Also, it is a more discreet camera bag than some, and doesn't scream, "Im carrying a nice camera!". It also came very nicely packaged in a nice cotton bag that was then double bagged in plastic. It showed the company really cares about the product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Sony a7 and a telephoto lense.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself feels very well built and high quality. It's small, waterproof (haven't fully tested it yet and I hope I never need to), with nice cushion and made from nice materials. I am able to bring along my Sony a7 with the standard 28 -70mm lens and a 50 -210 mm telephoto lens as well as plenty of small accessories like battery, cable, lens caps etc. It's not massive and bulky, it fits just what I need for around town shooting for the day. I can also put it into my larger bag and it doesn't take up too much space. I will be purchasing another larger bag from them for ALL of the gear I need.
customer_reviews.author: Denverdude

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional bag. I got the large size. Very spacious- can hold my Sony A6000 with the 16-50 mm lens and strap attached, a separate 55-210 mm lens, 3 batteries, a battery charger, cloths, cell phone- and has plenty more room for other accessories. The large bag comes with a smaller bag inside that can be removed to put into a separate bag. (I put this smaller compartment into my hiking backpack). This smaller bag has little pieces that make up separate compartments inside the bag, adjustable by velcro. Last pic attached is the size of the LARGE bag next to an iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what I want for a micro 4/3 system
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. It appears to be well made and sturdy. The interior dimensions are exactly what I wanted. There is just enough room to store a micro 4/3 camera (Olympus e-pm2) with a Panasonic 12-60 attached and an Olympus 40-150. For those who want to store more or larger camera, you may want to consider a large bag. It gave 5 stars because it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: PhotographerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, cheap, durable, stylish camera bag! Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Fits about any form of camera that isn't a massive studio camera(you wouldn't be here if looking for something to store those in, anyway). Of all the other bags I looked at, this seemed like a wise choice and it was, because it's actually leather with waterproof material inside, strong Velcro liners. Plenty of pockets. Looks rad. Very happy with it, since buying in September 2017. Personal use: I have a Sony A6300 mirror-less camera with a Canon digital zoom lens and adapter plus all the other things one needs for adequate shooting. There is a space for everything with this cool and stylish bag. Watch the review for more insight into this most wonderful camera bag!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cuteness
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few months so I have given this camera bag some time before I wrote this- first loved the look but it’s been 3 months and a lot of use & the snap front is loose, the bag sags some not firm- and really not enough padding in the beginning to Secord a lens and camera. Again I wS going for the cute factor BUT after it is worn a few times that is even gone (just did not hold up) buckle is also breaking after 3/4 months of use
customer_reviews.author: PAction

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: Although I was a bit skeptical about the size of the bag, I decided to order it, I'm glad I did. It's the perfect size for what I was looking for. I can comfortably fit a Nikon 3200 with a 35mm attached a plus a 50mm, and my battery charger. The front pocket has room for extra cards, extra battery, cleaning pen and little accessories. I haven't try the "waterproof" part but if something happens I'll update this. I like the design of the bag, i got the gray/yellow color and it's pretty. I think that it could use a little bit more of padding but it's still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised. Small camera bag for toting around ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Small camera bag for toting around your camera/gear while traveling and you do not want to lug a large, heavy bag. I will note that it is meant to carry just essentials, not all your gear. It JUST fits my Sony a6000 mirrorless camera with the 35-55 mm kit lens on + the 50-210 mm kit lens in the main compartment, which comes with these velcro padded dividers inside. The outer pocket holds my two spare batteries, plug-in charger, spare SD card, USB cord, and car charger. Haven't used it during rainy weather, but I ordered it for its compact size to just carry the basics.
customer_reviews.author: TripleC188

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy camera bag
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy camera bag. It met my expectations completely. It fits my camera and three lenses, plus a flash and filters. I put batteries, SD cards, and microfiber towel in the front pockets. I also like it made by waterproof materials because I go fishing and camping all the time. The waterproof is very important for me. I've used it three times, but it seems like it'll last forever. People also love it and just think it's a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bag and so far so good! For reference, I’m 5’7 and have a Nikon D3200. The strap is long enough to adjust. There’s enough space to carry around what I need for mini trips. In the pictures below I have my camera, three pouches of lenses, and lens hood inside. You can also fit some SD cards, an extra battery, lens wipe, mini lotion, money, cards, portable charger and/or your phone in the front with no issue. I’ll update 2-3 months from :) !
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera bag that would also double as a purse when I’m traveling. I was really excited when I came across this bag and ordered it immediately after reading the reviews. Upon arrival I noticed how cheap the lining of the bag was, but I thought if it gets me a years worth of use it was worth it. Just slightly over a month since purchasing the bag the lining is falling apart. I first noticed the zipper was fraying the binding. I have an actual hole the seam in the interior bag! Would not recommend for frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: deegeecookie

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking your camera easier and more fun.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. Because of its small size it’s easy to take everywhere and makes taking my camera on trips way easier and more fun than carrying my big shoulder bag. How often do you really need the tripod...?! Fits my a6000 and one larger lense in the main compartment. The little front pocket has room for chargers, spare batteries, spare as cards, cleaning solution, wipe. And it’s not filled to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Light wieght and perfect to carry all day
customer_reviews.text: I was the guy who had its pockets full of lens, caps and filters walking around all day, i hated every bag i bought. This messenger style bag, i have to stay i love. i can fit my DSLR with lens, 2 additional lens and flash all in this bag...and with the cross shoulder strap i dont even feel fatigue..i finally have a bag i love. I will buy a larger version of this when i have to long distance travel now.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: it works fine as a camera bag
customer_reviews.text: it works fine as a camera bag, but i don't like that the inside of the bag is neon yellow. the dividers are are little flimsy but also works fine! update: im giving them an extra star because their customer service was very thoughtful as they reached out to me and explained that the neon yellow is so photographers can find their camera parts, like batteries/lenses, easier since most of these equipments are black. They did offer me a full refund to consider improving my rating. I am giving the extra star for their customer service and their explanation of the neon yellow color on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: WSC

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera bag and day bag
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera bag and day bag! Love this for traveling or going into the city for the day. Plenty of room for my new mirrorless camera (Olympus EM10 mark ii), plus whatever else I need for the day - wallet, phone, sunglasses, spare batteries, etc. Plus, the straps on the main flap are actually magnetic closures, making for easy access to my camera for a quick pic when something catches my eye. There are zipper closures underneath for both the main compartment and front pocket for extra security when needed.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. The pockets, strap & buckles are all very practical. Two reasons for 4 instead of 5 stars: 1. The yellow inside is not very attractive. It takes away from the cool vintagey outside. I knew this buying it but decided to get it because of the look & practicality. 2. I wish the inside bag & dividing walls were more solid. I used both dividers together to keep it more open. But I’m overall very pleased with the bag. It has a lot of storage & works well as an every day bag incognito. I’m taking it hiking in Peru so I’m praying to god its actually waterproof 😅
customer_reviews.author: Ericka E.

customer_reviews.title: Small Bag, but adorable and fits just enough.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my Nikon D3100 with two basic zoom lenses; one attached, one on top - could definitely put both lenses side by side with the body on top with the adjustable padded dividers, but since I apparently lost the back end to one of my lenses, this is the best positioning. It's very comfortable, my phone and extra batteries/SD cards fit in the front. Definitely a good bag for an amateur photographer or if you plan on going somewhere where you only need one/smaller lenses for a shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Cute Camera Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great camera bag, fits my DSLR + two lens and accessories. The measurements and photos are accurate, so make sure you know what size you want before ordering. It's also quite stylish! I like that the inner pouch is padded and removable for easy access and extra protection for the camera body. Quality seems real nice, but I've only had it for a little while. Time will tell if it lasts long, I will update the review if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: christopher burt

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as expected; but I'll find some use for it.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be significantly larger (I measured against a norther similar bag I had already) but it barely would fill my full frame Sony and even one other lens. Overall, the bag is pretty ugly and the interior plastic lining is frankly ugly. Really not a fan! However, I have so much camera equipment I know I'll find some use for it..
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!... Perfect size for a small DSLR and a spare lens
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty small, but it turns out to be the perfect size for me. In the main compartment it holds my Nikon D5600 with 18-200mm lens attached. There is just enough room remaining to hold a 35mm prime lens, stock charger, and SB-400 flash. The front pocket will hold a few very small items, like a battery and a USB cable. If you have a larger DSLR (like D7500, or D500) then you may not be able to carry a spare lens. This is an attractive well built bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for little day trips where I don't need my complete camera set up with me. It's perfect for that. It holds my camera, a couple of lenses, ND filters, step-up rings, and some extra batteries. Granted I try to keep things pretty compact, but this holds all of it without any issue. My wife thinks it pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse/camera bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Nikon 5300 with lens (18-55mm), although if I get a larger lens I wil probably have to separate the lens from the camera for it to fit. Even with the camera in it, I was still able to fit in a phone and a wallet. It was quite full, but it worked. It is a nice purse for travel and looks good. Just got back from a 2 week trip and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MtnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Best low-profile bag for camera
customer_reviews.text: I own a Sony a6100 with three lenses: 50mm, 16-50mm and 25mm. I can fit all in my bag, also with strap included in the main place. In the extra space I have batteries, clean cloth, and some stuff to use. I can genuinely say this is one of the best for my camera, because you aren't saying you have a camera inside. It can be used for anything else. Overall, lovely bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good size, looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much! Perfect size for a beginner lens and a camera, with a front pocket for assorted small items. The strap is comfortable and moderately long (I wear it crossbody) and I feel like my camera is very safe, as it has removable padding inside. Havent tested the water resistance, but it should handle a decent rain or so.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my cannon camera and a 75/300mm telephoto lens. It has velcro padded separators that you can move around which is really great. It also seems water resistant, not sure about water proof. But if it rained or snowed I think it would be fine. Its build nice just a little smaller than I expected. I should have looked at the dimensions. I still use it all the time. I'll probably get a lens case and store my camera and smaller parts here.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag. Fits old Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: We found and bought an old Polaroid One step camera. Needed a bag to store/carry it in. I bought the medium size, and the Polaroid fits perfectly. There isn't a lot of extra space to put more items in, but thats fine. Not needed. Very cute bag. Seems well made so far. Closures are magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera bag
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this camera bag, it’s so easy to use and I can store a lot of stuff in there, the look is amazing because I like wearing grey and brown when I am going out to take pictures for an event or even just with friends and it fits my look. I am thinking about getting a backpack but right now I am perfectly settled with this bag since it works real well with me
customer_reviews.author: Re-Imagine Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camera bag. It’s easy to get in and out of and for traveling it doesn’t “look” like a camera bag. The color has a vintage look and I’m glad I chose the larger size to hold the camera, extra lens and my battery packs. Although this is a camera bag, it’s such a great design I’d use it for other things as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this case five stars because it seem to be a very protective and durable case. I took this bag to Paris France on a 5-day trip and it only lasted 4 days before the magnetic buttons that hold it closed, one of them fell off and could not be put back. now the bag will not stay closed on its own. Very disappointing and I will need to find a new bag before my summer vacation trip.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I can fit my Fuji XT-1 with 18mm lens, and my 35mm. I like the front pocket for extra cards. Doesn't quite fit my charger comfortably, but that's because the charger cord is so long and doesn't fold well. I've had this for about a year and use it all the time, good purchase. I also like that it doesn't look like a camera bag, it looks like a purse.
customer_reviews.author: HollyW

customer_reviews.title: pretty dope
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks more spacious then it actually is, but it fits my dslr in just right. not much room for other equipment like lenses, and mics etc. but it’s good for just keeping my dslr safe. I like to travel light when I go out filming so I wish this bag could fit a few more things, other then that it’s very cute and stylish. all though i wish the interior was more spacious I like that it’s small and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag! Fits my Fujifilm XT20 with the 80-55mm lens still attached with room for lots of extra accessories. The top flap of the bag seems kind of useless and is just there to make it look more hipster, but it works and it got me to buy it... I also use this as a little festival day bag cause I can fit a normal plastic water bottle in it along with a vape pen and what not. I haven't really tested the water resistant ability of this bag too much but it seems like it would do an alright job against moderate rain.
customer_reviews.author: Shmitter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag and fits a lot of film
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for traveling with your Polaroid. I bought the light grey medium bag and It fits my Polaroid OneStep+ and 4 packs of film in the main pocket. It has a flap that I use to protect the camera lens in the main pocket. The zippers glide really nice and I like how the flap has magnetic clips and not velcro. The smaller front pocket can fit my iPhone X and the Polaroid charger. I can also fit a 5th packet of film if I take my phone out. I put some leather lotion on the handle and flaps to keep them hydrated and some waterproof spray on the bag. Very nice durable bag
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a trip to Africa
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter who will be on a semester in Africa studying wild animals. The bag wil hold her camera and extra lens. It is light-weight and folds flat when not in use. It is a well-made, rugged useful gear.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL C. Laincz

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Perfect for day travel with my camera.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’0”. This bag looks kinda big but I’m really small. Doesn’t feel big at all and I absolutely love it! In the pics you’ll see my camera in the bag. Canon 70d with a 18-135mm lens on it. It fits extremely well with a little room on top.(I’ll be putting my passport, Id and money for my day trip there) Plenty of room in front pocket for an extra battery, And SD card. It has pieces to separate inside but my camera fits perfectly inside it without them. Excited to take it to Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dallin

customer_reviews.title: The smallest one fits Canon EOS Rebel SL2 body and two lenses
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried, but it fits the basics - the body, my 18-55 lens (attached), and my 75-300 lens. There's room for the mirror and lens covers not being used, the battery charger, and my gigantic cushy strap in the main compartment. I haven't put anything in the front pocket, but there's enough room for plenty of spare batteries, memory cards, remote shutters and whatnot. I could have definitely put the charger and the covers in the front pocket, I just didn't want to. Definitely a good little inconspicuous bag.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Pratschler

customer_reviews.title: Small but good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. I was shocked at how small it was when I got it. It does fit her canon rebel dslr and one other lens. It would be too small for my taste my she loves it. She takes it everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beck

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: The inside is more of a vibrant yellow rather than the lime green it looks as pictured. I LOVE this bag. It looks so vintage and sophisticated, and it fit my Canon 77d and lenses perfectly alone with my phone, chargers, and any little accessory I needed for that day. Its well constructed and the inner compartment comes out of the bag so you can take out just your camera if you'd like. The bag is well sealed with zippers and waterproofing, and I have to say- for $30, I am SO impressed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable
customer_reviews.text: Havent gotten wet so not sure about the water resistance. But my wife loves this for her Nikon camera. She has looked at many bags, but this one stood out with the most style. Two lenses fit into the bag as well as extra batteries. Very cute style!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flagg

customer_reviews.title: Nice small case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small case for a small SLR camera. I use it for a Sony a6000 with a Sony G 18-105 f/4 lens. It fits in a back pack for air travel. Only complaint, it could use a little more padding on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: douglas miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome!! I bought it this past summer while I was working as a photographer at a summer camp. Needed something waterproof and this did the job! It's a great size to keep your camera in for on the go, it's very well made, and it's held up wonderfully. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L stapel

customer_reviews.title: Nice traveling bag
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's small, I only carry 2 prime lenses for my Sony a6000. The camera bag only fits one lense with the body camera. But I have another lense case for my other lenses so that's okay. I gave it a 4 star because the straps are short for me, since I'm so tall.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality, great design, highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This camera bag is impeccable! Very high quality, nice design, and my camera feels safe and secure inside. I ordered the smaller bag and it fits my Canon 80D and 2 lenses pretty snug, so if you have more lenses/equipment that you like to take with you, I'd recommend getting the larger bag. I love the zipper pouch in the front for my wallet, keys and phone. Overall I am 100% satisfied with this purchase, and I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bag that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag during the Prime Day sale for my Nikon D7000. It is a perfect bag for traveling, camping or whatever. It really doesn't look like a camera bag and it is really big enough to hold my camera and at least two more lenses. I think the color and the detail makes the bag a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Kandeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag [large grey one]
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, well-designed camera bag. The finishing touches are detailed. It is stylish. There’s plenty of pockets to store any other personal item you wanna carry with you, which makes it all the more useful. I haven’t had it for long, so I don’t know how it stands the test of time, but it looks robust. I was also very pleasantly surprised by the fact that the inner canvas is totally removable. So if you wish to carry your camera in another bag, like a backpack, you can very well do so! The inner canvas is customizable with two strapping pieces. I definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Benoit Dhalluin

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it's a pretty tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This bag is small and not bulky, which is what I wanted for my new Canon Rebel T6. It comes with 2 padded inserts that can be moved around. I took one out and moved the other sideways so I could fit both my Camera with the short lens attached on one side and the zoom lens on the other. My camera has a strap attached to it as well and it still fits. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it's a pretty tight fit, but all in all, so far I'm happy that I'm not carrying around a bulky camera bag as I travel!
customer_reviews.author: abbey

customer_reviews.title: Better than a standard DSLR bag!
customer_reviews.text: The large bag easily fits my Nikon D5300 with a 10-20mm DX lens attached, a 35mm prime and 18-55mm lens and the battery charger. Looks much better than the standard black DSLR bags.
customer_reviews.author: David Negron

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!  Highly recommended especially for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is AMAZING! I brought it with me to China and Japan and it not only fit my camera (Canon Rebel T6) and a telephoto lense but there was still room for snacks, my passport, wallet and a few odds and ends. It rained a bit while I was there and the camera was perfectly safe and dry. It was even safe when I didn't zip it (though if it is a downpour, I would recommend doing so. There is even some padding to keep your items safe and protected from being bumped into!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Bergum

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag that does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for traveling. Well padded and I really like that it doesn't look like a camera bag. The yellow interior color is a little bright but doesn't really detract from the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits T7i, lens on. Quick access. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a plain black bag. I wanted an elegant, easy access bag and this is it. I fold the zipper flap inside (pictures uploaded) so I can flip open the top and grab the camera easily. I put the charger block in there too.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty nice. It looks good, is built durably, I've spilled stuff on it and it's for sure waterproof, and just generally holds up very well for a cheap price. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barney J Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Too square for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, but was missing pieces and mine wasn’t stitched evenly on the front flap... which drove me bonkers. It also didn’t sit right/comfortably on me since it’s super boxy to me.
customer_reviews.author: MellieMelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Ordered 1 day shipping and came on time. Packaged really nicely. The quality of this bag is really durable and looks just like the picture. The Medium one is only made to fit one camera and one lens and some smaller accessories. If your looking to hold more of go with the large bag!
customer_reviews.author: manda

customer_reviews.title: Attractive camera bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds my Canon Rebel T5, plus 3 lenses and accessories. Appears to be good quality material and construction. Bought this for our trip to Costa Rica. Will update if any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant and compact
customer_reviews.text: It is water proof for torrential rain and water rides. Kept my camera safe in Disney and moving. Not the best drop proof bag but gets the job done. The small pocket is perfect for credit cards, but some smart phones might not fit. The bag is very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Good size for 1 camera and 2 lens. We took it to disney and it worked as a purse/camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: LuckMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It looks very nice. Unfortunately, I will have to return it because it is too small for my D750 mounted, + one additional lens. Sad :-( Would have really like it to work out
customer_reviews.author: DAIL

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small, cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: this bag was so much smaller than i thought it'd be, however, I figured I'd give it a chance since it's a hassle to return. After 3 days of owning it the strap with the button to close it broke. At that point I had to make a return. At the price I paid I expected a lot more in either size or at the very least for such a small bag the quality should've been far better.
customer_reviews.author: Jerman Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but too small for my camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Canon 5D Mark II with battery grip and there was NO WAY I could fit my camera in this bag, let alone another lens. It is a really well made bag however, buckles are functional, fabric seems strong and its a damn cute bag. Too bad my old clunky camera was too fat for it! I might keep it around if I decide to upgrade to a smaller camera. Bottom line, cute and sturdy bag, my massive ass camera was too fat for it :(
customer_reviews.author: Maddy T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the bag is great and I love the adjustable partitions
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the bag is great and I love the adjustable partitions. The small size bag is perfect for carrying around my Sony a6000, 1-2 small prime lenses OR 1 zoom lens, and a little filter wallet thingy. Front pocket holds my charger and cleaning supplies. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: isabellamaxine

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-1000
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s Pentax K-1000 camera and flash unit. Works perfectly and looks cool (not nerdy).
customer_reviews.author: Blue Racer

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for Sony Mirrorless A7iii, fits camera body with one lens attached and one additional lens comfortably. Front pocket has just enough room to fit charging cable, memory cards, a few credit cards and some change. Very easy to access and light weight build makes this travel friendly. I have been using this for over a month now and have no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Archana S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3 lenses nice a snug. Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks good fits my Nikon d7500, 50mm, 16-80mm, and 70-300. It's snug but that's not a bad thing smaller bag the better. Has a pocket that fits the charger and a couple filters
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag for the price! I suggest this bag to a lot of people and get complimented a lot on the appearance and quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with a 18-200mm lens mounted to a D5100
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a more inconspicuous camera bag while going around Europe for a month. Worked great with a 18-200mm lens mounted to a D5100, with a little room in the pockets for some lens wipes, and extra memory card, and a few little things.
customer_reviews.author: James in SJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little on the small size.
customer_reviews.text: Its a really nice bag, but a little smaller than expected. It doesn't fit my camera well if I want to carry 2 lens. I also can't really keep my camera in the bag with the lens attached to the camera. Other that that, its a really nice back, very sturdy and protective and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a day at the fair without having to carry as massive backpack! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Natalie lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my camera and a lens. I tried outing one more lens in the bag but it is too tight. Really like the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: TBC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera bag.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Looks nice. was able to put in my canon dslr and 2 lenses in with still a little room to spare. More comfortable to carry than some of the more ridged camera bags that I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for Nikon Coolpix P-900 and additional gear as well as just looking like a cute bag.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bag but one of the straps broke the first time I took it out on an excursion. Other than that, perfect for travel and a great size for Canon rebel EOS.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: It's not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I use the bag to carry my Sony video cam and batteries and wireless microphones connection cable Sony camcorder light. It's small contact and it looks greet.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I actually received this as a gift and it is perfect for my canon rebel 7. It’s very cushioned and it’s confortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful compact camera bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect ! I ordered a large, it comfortably fits my Nikon d3500 with a lens and leaves room for two more lenses! I can also comfortably fit my chargers, batteries and extra necessities!! The quality is great! I love the inside color being bright, so that I can see What’s inside my bag easily in darker settings! Wonderful bag ! Will be ordering a few as gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor preston

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the medium to fit my Cannon Rebel DSLR ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium to fit my Cannon Rebel DSLR with the kit lens attached and a zoom lens. This definitely is too small to fit a camera and two lenses as stated in the description. Returning and ordering the larger size
customer_reviews.author: Emily Love

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than most, but works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than anticipated, but overall it's a great bag to carry around when I don't want my big camera backpack. This fits my 18-200mm lens, and my camera with a 35mm lens attached. Kinda tight, but works for when I need it. I also carry my charger, and extra memory cards in the front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling. If you want it to hold more than your camera and 1 lens then order the larger size. This bag barely fits my mark iii and 85 1.2. But overall it serves it purpose for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Moss

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: The cutest camera bag that i have ever seen! Its just not the right size for my gear. However, before i got more gear the button that keeps the bag closed broke off the second day. I can see that it was poorly placed on there sooo that's a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: SLR camera fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I took this camera bag on a trip and it allowed me the freedom to access my SLR camera quickly. The camera body fits snug inside and it has a zipper to protect it. I was able to put the camera inside quickly and take it out quickly. The bonus was that the extra zippered pocket was just big enough to store a second lens. Nice camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Margo932

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag! It is a bit small if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag! It is a bit small if you plan on having more than one lens out in the field with you. It holds my Nikon D3400 very well with either my 18-55mm or 55mm-200mm lens, but not both. The pocket in front of the main storage allows for an extra battery and smaller accessories. Overall, I am pleased with this purchase. I will probably get the bigger version down the road, just so I can carry more than one lens with me.
customer_reviews.author: Tzomb1e

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag, size is perfect, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, the look of it, the quality. The material is heavy duty and it's easy to carry when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my wife's canon camera. She loved it. It seemed to be of very good quality and had just enough room for what she needs it to hold: camera, battery, charger, sd cards, phone, etc. Seems like it will protect the camera well as the inside is well padded. Zippers are easy to manipulate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Fiancee for xmas, she loves it, I also have one of their weekend bags that I love, great products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: this was an extremely good find. I have a Nikon with 2 different ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was an extremely good find. I have a Nikon with 2 different lenses and it's a little bit tight but there is still room for everything. Lots of different pockets to store all kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: M Trott

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge camera and huge lenses. I usually carry a big/sturdy/professional camera backpack, however, needed something that would fit inside a hiking backpack as well. This bag was small enough for that but large enough to fit my essentials AND my camera on day trips. Great purchase for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Caudle

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera bag! I traveled a few places with this and actually used it as my camera bag/purse because it had enough room for my wallet as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: The Small WILL NOT fit a DSLR and extra lens.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely small bag, and as others have stated, very low quality. Ergonomics were also very poorly thought out. I’m glad I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel1984

customer_reviews.title: Great small bag for camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Perfect size for my DSLR. Took it on my mini vacation to Boston and New York. It even snowed a bit and kept my stuff inside dry. There was enough room to carry some other essentials too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how the inside color makes it look like a baby bag Everytime I open it. I wish it was more of a neutral color but it gets the job done and looks stylish when it's closed!
customer_reviews.author: Fiercebon14

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really like this bag. Kinda cheaply made and the materials on the inside were a strange color
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bag is not as steuctured as i would want. When you put your stuff in, it becomes a black hole. Also it is NOT leather like the ad says. Another thing was the way it is sewn, makes some compartments odd shaped and you are unable to open fully.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t just look good...
customer_reviews.text: It’s functional and durable. Looks great too. It has an inner removable bag that creates more space when removed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected,
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I expected, it fits my 5d with my 50 mm canon lens. Great product. If you have a 5d and you like to work with bigger lenses. I would recommend to get the Large one, but I love my 50 mm, so it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality protective bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a few days and have already fell in love with it!! It is easy for on the go with traveling and it has such a thick padding so I knew my camera (Canon Rebel T7i for reference) would not get damaged. Not to mention, the bag itself is stylish. It is small and lightweight while maintaining high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MU

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for grab and go
customer_reviews.text: Love it for a quick set up of a body and two lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Menace

customer_reviews.title: Durable and still pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the easily customized dividers and the bright color inside. This bag is perfect not just for your camera but would be great as a day bag in general. It easily fits my Sony A7 camera and 1 extra lens.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Alder-Janes

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little bag. seems durable and fits my Sony a6000 and extra lens perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: J
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera Bag durible well made, looks nice. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jake D

customer_reviews.title: I would say it's best for outings where you don't need a whole lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this bag so far! It's very cute, and despite being quite small I still manage to fit my Nikon FA's body and three lenses (24mm, 28-50mm, and 105mm for reference) in there without much trouble. I received a lot of compliments on it too! It also seems very durable and I trust it to keep my camera and lenses safe. I would say it's best for outings where you don't need a whole lot of gear due to the size, but it's definitely worth owning and using!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Enough for a small as ll camera.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't as big as I thought it would be although it stated that it would fit my camera. It does, but with no room for anything else Wish it head extra pockets
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Yunto

product_meta.title: S-ZONE Waterproof Camera Bag Canvas Leather Trim Compatible With DSLR SLR Camera Messenger Bag
feature_bullets: Material: High Density Waterproof Canvas with PU Leather Trim, strong stitching, durable zipper, quick snap buckle
Size: 7(L)*4(W)*9(H)inch, Designed for 1 camera, 1 lenses and mini digital camera; Self adhering padded dividers for interior customization
Durable and soft Cotton inner material insert for absorbing shock and vibration To protect your camera against damages, dust and scratches.
Additional front pocket designed for your cellphone, wallet, business cards,etc
Besides being a dedicated camera case, it can also be a daily fashion messenger shoulder bag
